other-details.name: Actor
other-details.details: Advantage on Deception and Performance checks, mimic the speech of a person or the sounds made

other-details.name: Song of Rest
other-details.details:
Your music during a short rest heals allies and friendly creatures. Health recovered is equal to
- lvl 1: 1d8
- lvl 9: 1d10
- lvl 13: 1d12
